website_summaries.verdict: One of Dyson’s most powerful stick vacuums with twice the suction of any cordless model, though you’ll pay more for all that power.
pros: 40% more suction power than previous Dyson models
LCD screen monitors performance and shows run-time countdown
Converts to handheld model with tools for car cleaning
cons: One of the more expensive Dyson stick vacuums
Some users find the handle uncomfortable to hold for long periods

customer_reviews.title: Large Motorhead Issues
customer_reviews.text: The motorhead does not spin, took 14 days (and 10+ hours of wait time to speak to Dyson) to get a replacement . The replacement has the same issue - so waiting again on hold. WORST PRODUCT EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Urban

customer_reviews.title: Would not even turn on. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could say we loved this vacuum. Unfortunately it didnt work. Did not turn on, nor charge. Contacted Dyson.... they said they could do nothing because this was not an authorized dealer and could be a fake. Due to all of the positive reviews I want to give this seller the opportunity to rectify the situation and replace the vacuum with another one and I will review that replacement fairly. Wish me luck.
customer_reviews.author: RN30

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a replacement for one burned up in a forest fire. Pricey but it's for the wife. No, I'm not going complain. Happy wife, happy life.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas (Sherri's husband)

customer_reviews.title: Most powerful cordless vacuum I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this vacuum. This little thing is like a shop vac suction wise. If you have pets this is perfect. It gets up pet hair and cat litter very well and the brushes come out of the head very easy to clens out. Yeah it's expensive, but worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum was AWESOME for 60 days. Suddenly, the trigger stopped working and the vacuum doesn’t even attempt to run. Contacted Dyson and customer service was great on the phone but here I am one month later with a $700 broom closet decoration. STILL NO REPLACEMENT! This is pathetic service for such an expensive piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: The Header jammed and product came as used
customer_reviews.text: The item came with the box horribly smashed but Dyson's package still okay. After I unboxed it, the vacuum looked like used. there were dusted and the header jammed. I'm not paying $600+ for a faulty and used product. I saw from previous reviews about replacement but this is a no for my case.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: great product working great with 220V ( just need adapter Us to EU) i have the some plastic ring issue - the main brush did not spin - just took it out like the first guy and its started to work great got 4 stars just due to the plastic ring issue
customer_reviews.author: Udi Maoardi

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is perhaps the first product from Amazon that I am utterly disappointment. The performance is very poor and now the head stopped spinning and is unusable. Never expected such a poor quality product from Dyson. Stay away from this and save your hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Arvind Rao

customer_reviews.title: BAD BRUSH BAR
customer_reviews.text: Dyson gets 2 stars from me on the V11 simply because the brush bar will not spin right out of the box. It barely spins by hand, and will not come out so I can inspect it. Called Dyson. Because the units (V11) are so new, they don't have replacement parts. My only option is to exchange it or return it. Opted to exchange it, which means a completely new serial number and negates any future return. Nice QC Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Kory B

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Yeah. I used V6 before, so this V11 is really fantastic especially in the vaccum power and the battery life. The previous model had always been turned off while cleaning my house so that I had to clean every floor seperately. But this model is working very long and LED monitor let me know how much time would be available, that's so awesome. Actually, there was a trouble with Amozon, because they kept recommending return the item when I was asking about not arriving extension hose. But, about a week later, the hose was arrived and I'm completely satisfied all things!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but problems
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but problems with this machine. I decided to buy this because I have a toddler and wanted to make sure my floors are as dust free as possible. Within weeks I had to get a replacement head since the brush bar was stuck and couldn't be opened (making the machine useless). I did manage to get this sent through customer service. Now the suction pulses on and off sometimes with notifications that there is a blockage (though I've taken the whole thing apart and found no blockages). I highly regret this purchase. At this price I don't expect a vacuum to have this many problems.
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum, fast delivery. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Great, powerful, light weight vacuum cleaner.. Customer service was very fast to respond to an issue that I had and was able to resolve it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO Extra Soft Dusting Brush Bundle
customer_reviews.text: The item didn't come with the Extra Soft Dusting Brush Bundle as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Margitle

customer_reviews.title: Cannot beat a dyson
customer_reviews.text: It will show you how filthy your house gets daily... sucks more than the Cleveland Browns...
customer_reviews.author: HUGOBOSSRUFF

customer_reviews.title: My first ever dyson
customer_reviews.text: Well, I was super excited when it arrived. I’ve been contemplating spending this much on a sweeper for a while. Im surprised to say I’m a little disappointed, it’s kind of doppy and awkward to use, the engine is heavy but the stick is light so it makes it awkward to use. Second the trigger thing is kind of dumb, it hurts my thumb to constantly hold, and there needs to be a stay on button like a regular sweeper. Also the vacuum head is pretty small so it only covers a small area, wish that was a little bigger. Overall I’m not really sure if it was worth the cost or the hype.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Dilbeck

customer_reviews.title: Overly expensive considering fixable issues
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Battery life too short. Canister fills fast, too small. Very expensive with obvious fixable issues.
customer_reviews.author: maddenwp

customer_reviews.title: Scam Artist
customer_reviews.text: How the hell do I order a new Dyson and receive an old used one? What the heck!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Turner

customer_reviews.title: Completely worth the hype
customer_reviews.text: Is it worth the hype? Yes. 100 percent yes. This vacuum is unreal. I have mostly hard floors with tons of different area rugs of varying thickness, plus some carpeted rooms. It switches between flooring seamlessly. I’m not sure of battery life; it seems to last for awhile. The fact is that I can vacuum so quickly, I don’t need it running for 60 minutes. The attachments are also fantastic. You can easily vacuum furniture, small crevices, etc., and I’m assuming it would be great on carpeted stairs. It took me awhile to finally make this purchase and I’m so glad I did. Do not hesitate with this one - it’s completely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Be aware NO WARRANTY thru this seller!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so my dyson is 2 months old and the torque head vacuume broke apart inside. I thought no big deal it will be under warranty. Nope! Just got letter from Dyson saying no warranty because this is an unauthorized dyson dealer. So now I'm very much peeved! For starters I paid nearly $600 (which soon after purchase it dropped $100) and now I've got to spend $115 plus shipping on the part to repair it! This is ridiculous that Amazon doesnt make this evidently 3rd party seller state that there is zero warranty thru Dyson!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Nelson

customer_reviews.title: “Caveat Emptor” on lightly used gear
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a V11 Torque Steer, received a V7. 4 less V’s than I ordered. 10 out of 10. Would order again. I’m sure the V11 will be amazing once it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Beat Professa

customer_reviews.title: QUIT less than 60 days!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered June 19, arrived the 21st: Vacuum stopped working entirely, trigger doesn’t start the vacuum. Just quit, currently talking to Dyson on the phone. August 16th today. Love love love the vacuum but want a working condition. Would give 4+ stars except for not working.
customer_reviews.author: Deana J

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long??
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and finally convinced myself to ditch my worthless Hoover cordless and purchase the V11. I am EXTREMELY happy with Dyson and it is so easy to handle and switch accessories as needed! The canister is easy to empty. I cannot be more pleased! I’m sold!
customer_reviews.author: SAM52

customer_reviews.title: Love my dyson
customer_reviews.text: Love my dyson! This is amazing! It seriously picks up so much dirt and I love on the auto setting I can go from carpet to laminate and wood without having to change settings. It’s great for in between deep cleaning but yet it still gives me that deep cleaning I know and love from a dyson! It’s not that heavy the top is more heavy but I’m actually loving it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Teelyb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product . . . with excellent response when something goes wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great, exactly as advertised!!! Yet, ironically, the Motörhead attachment broke down the very first time I used it . . . but here comes the “great” news . . . the customer service people at Dyson immediately sent me a replacement with 2-day shipping, so now everything is working wonderfully once again.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hench

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I h ad to send back to Dyson. It did not work and they are sending me a new one😏
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner was great. When I first got it until it decided to quit only and I can’t get anybody to support me or fix it. It’s supposed to have a two-year warranty on it yet I cannot get through to the people on what to do next I have called emailed. Getting nowhere. Feel like I’m stuck with a $500 vacuum That work for about a month or two
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: The switch on my vac broke after 5 months of light use. Dyson’s response to me for warranty service was to drive for 2 1/2 hours to the service center, drop it off and the. Make the 5 hour round trip to pick it up once it got repaired. Would not allow me to ship the vac! What kind of warranty service is that. Had to pay to get it fixed at a local repair facility. This was my sixth dyson. No more, they just lost a loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: Jlynnm

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves it, good for a dyson
customer_reviews.text: Very good suction, a little bulky for a handheld but I used it for about an hour on an off and only went through a third of the battery (indicated). My biggest gripe is that they switched from a bottom dispensing waste canister to a front dispensing style which means you have to remove whatever attachment before emptying. It’s not more sanitary and is just annoying compared to the old style. Otherwise nice for a plastic over priced dyson
customer_reviews.author: HobbyMan

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: I moved into my studio apartment in the city and wasn't able to vacuum for about a month until I could buy this. It came in the mail, I charged it up, and out of my 350 square foot apartment came a full tank of dust! The suction is amazing! It's also light, maneuverable, and easy to use. Switching back and forth between attachments is also super easy. I also appreciate the air filters. I remember vacuuming growing up, and my nose would always get stuffy from old vacuums blowing dust all over the place. This one filters the air so well that I have no sinus issues. Overall, I'm 100% pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Satisfying to see all the dust and dirt you’ve been missing
customer_reviews.text: My house is new construction 7000 sq ft and its 2 years old. I have a corded central vac and 2 roborock s6; both new. I bought the Dyson V11 Torque to do harder to reach places, stairs, baseboards etc. Dragging central vac around was not fun. One use of the V11 and I fell in love. It is freaking amazing!!! It is slightly heavy so I use two hands but when you see how much it picks up you’ll be totally hooked. Also bought the extra soft roller head for hardwood floors that everyone raves about on YouTube. It is totally worth it if you have hardwood or tiled floors.
customer_reviews.author: KimZ

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning - awful emptying
customer_reviews.text: This out vacuums any other I’ve ever owned, including my other Dyson cordless corded Dyson Ball. The battery time is decent in normal mode. Drains quickly when using the highest setting, but I rarely need that. Whoever thought that needing to remove the canister to empty it was a good idea should be fired. It is not easy to remove it and then you have to find a place to prop up the wand while emptying the canister. Very poor design. Cleaning - 5 stars. Emptying - 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Richard McCluskey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boomer vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: I opened and mounted the first night. I would have preferred a metal mount but the plastic one works fine. The parts click together with an easy red button click. One page assembly instructions - it's simple. Day 2 it is charged and after taking it out my wife and daughter are girding for who gets to use it. My wife has bad knees and using it for stairs is easy. The vacuum easily pulls up dog hair - we have 2 - without fouling. Emptying is a bit tricky but once you get a hang of the shaft removal it is straightforward. Strong A+ performer.
customer_reviews.author: Charles McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Don't miss this one while it's on sale.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this yesterday and I love it!! I always put off vacuuming, sometimes longer than I should because lugging the vac around is such a pain but this is a great to see the reward of your efforts in the canister, and so easy to empty. Great buy even though it was expensive. Now I'll see if my allergies are better because of its filtration system.
customer_reviews.author: G. Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Best littler sucker!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so amazing! I thought my carpets were clean until I used this. Every room I use it in I fill the canister full. I’m totally grossed out that I lived with that stuff in my carpets! The suction and ease of use is excellent! I love that it automatically adjusts from carpet to wood floor by itself. Because the head is smaller than what I was using before I’m now able to get under my dressers, bed, and under coaches! I highly recommend this! I NEVER leave feedback, but since I really think this is an outstanding product I felt obligated to share my thoughts!
customer_reviews.author: NI

customer_reviews.title: Best for the money
customer_reviews.text: Has 3 settings: Full on, which will suck anything up including the dog; Medium. which is great for carpets, and low for bare floors. But forget about it, because it adjusts automatically to clean either carpets or floors. No settings to worry about unless you want the Goliath setting, Full on. Love the portability, and the quality. Only downside is, for a high pet dander and fur count, container needs to be emptied frequently, but this is a snap. Just point to the garbage can, and it's gone. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: danielsden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Handheld Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have a Dyson canister vacuum that I’ve been using for a few years now and sorely needed a handheld vacuum for quick cleanups. Naturally, I gravitated towards Dyson and read the great reviews of the V11. It doesn’t disappoint. I can’t believe how easy it is to use this vacuum. Easy to maneuver and the suction is awesome. I wish the battery lasted a bit longer. If you have all hardwood floors, the battery will last long but if you have carpets/rugs, the battery takes a hit when cleaning them.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Price Tag!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 children, a dog and when we added a cat to the mix I needed an upgrade to keep the house clean. This is the newest of cordless vacuums in the Dyson family. After careful research, the newest design and battery life was worth the price. It will last about 45 minutes which was more than clean our 3 story home in one charge. Despite the cleaning lady being at our just 1 day before my new vacuum arrived , I had to dump the canister twice from all the hair/dust missed by her vacuum. It works well of hardwood, tile where kitty little escapes the box, and cleans carpets/rugs better than any corded vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W.

customer_reviews.title: Main carpet head wears easily
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Lowering another star since a wheel broke on the main carpet head. After less than 4 months of owning it. Definitely not buying Dyson products anymore. It’s a cool vacuum, but I’ve been using it for three months and the threads on the main carpet head have already worn themselves out. And I cannot find a replacement available anywhere. Maintenance on the rest of the device seems to be quite straightforward and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Life changing vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Omgn! You don't know what a vacuum can be until you have one of these!! I damn near vacuum everyday now. Just because it's so lightweight and easy. And I'd love it! I even caught a wasp that was in the house with it and was able to look at it inside of it and three it outside! I take it to my massage suite and vacuum I'm vacuuming my car I have turned into a clean freak. All because of a vacuum. So in love with it so happy no complaints it's amazing! Life changing
customer_reviews.author: Clover Jené

customer_reviews.title: Failed suck
customer_reviews.text: Just failed after month. They make cheap products 4 one all fail.
customer_reviews.author: N/A

customer_reviews.title: Outsize cordless is great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the V11 Outsize Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, Nickel/Red. This thing is great! On hardwood I use the eco/low and it gets everything. Using the attachments, I use automatic/medium. With the High Torque XL cleaner head, auto does a good job switching the power up and down depending on the surface. For deep cleaning, boost mode works really great. I like how the outsize version comes with two batteries and two chargers. I love the cordless; makes vacuuming a breeze. Just click in a battery and go! Easy to do maintenance quick vacuuming during the week. The unit is balanced well and easy to use, but if you are a female with arthritis it might be a bit much.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hull

customer_reviews.title: So Easy and Light To Use At My Age
customer_reviews.text: I love the power this has and that it is not cumbersome or heavy to use. Great for older folks like us. We have 2 cats and 3 dogs in our home and this has been great for daily cleaning of pet hair. It is actually fun to use and my hubby even likes using it which is a winner for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great electric Vac
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, does what it says, easy to assemble, Light weight, really picks up whatever, and you can put the stand anywhere out of the way with attachments on it. Powerful cleaner, ease of use, tells you when to finish up to re charge. Able to do entire house with plenty to spare to help save the battery. Follow instructions. I left it charge all night the first time, than use it slowly for several times to help build the battery for a long life. Highly recommend. With $200 off its a steal.
customer_reviews.author: R. haskins

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding cordless vacuum1
customer_reviews.text: We just finish putting hardwood floors in our house. This vacuum suits our needs. I love all Dyson products and I highly recommend buying this if you are looking for a vacuum for hardwood or carpet floors.
customer_reviews.author: Deb DeHaven

customer_reviews.title: Just one issue, otherwise great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Dyson vacuum, first cordless Dyson. It works well and is easy to manouver. My one complaint is that the small trigger guard built into the grip to separate the trigger from where your other fingers rest feels uncomfortable — it’s either too sharp or not located in quite the right position for my hand or its shape is not optimal. Apart from that, I like this vac a lot and find it effective and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: I love Dyson's but NOT this machine
customer_reviews.text: For starters, it is very clunky compared to other models. I have the V8 and LOVE it! The main motor and collection vessel are huge and cumbersome. It's not easy to switch the parts as you can't see the hole because of the big piece than's in the way. Secondly, it's had running issues since the day I got it. I am very good at regularly deep cleaning the machine as you have to with Dyson's. Now the machine has totally quit on me. Dead. In spending hours on hold and with customer service reps, I have found out that the replacement part is not available. I'm stuck with a $500 vacuum that doesn't work. BUMMER!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Stanek

customer_reviews.title: BEST VACUUM EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot put into words what this vacuum means to me :) we had a Dyson upright for years and after hurting my knee, we needed to switch to something lightweight. This is INCREDIBLE. I was nervous about it being cordless because I thought the suction wouldn’t be as good. However it surpasses our old upright version. It lasts for about 40 mins on a charge and pulls up pounds of fur from our two lab dogs and cat!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: Boaters dream
customer_reviews.text: For people who have boats, this vacuum is a dream. I used to dread breaking out the vacuum, assembling it, then plugging it in. Now I just open a locker, grab the vacuum and clean up. Takes a minute or two to get all of the floors with the floor sweeper attachment. I suggest getting the after market hose for reaching hard to get places. I also use a velcro strap to keep the motor running hands free.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated with issues!
customer_reviews.text: So after two months the vacuum quick working. Company sent two replacement batteries because vacuum is under warranty still. Still does not work. Because of Covid all you can do for customer service is talk to a chat bot that tries to figure out what is wrong based on what you type. Clearly the battery is not the problem. Window for returning to Amazon closed. Now what? So frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: jl34

customer_reviews.title: Dyson V 11 turbo drive
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have hardwood floors and this cleans them great! Stays charged long enough for me to vacuum my 1600 square ft house with power left on bettery.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Died & Dyson customer service was unreachable by me and Amazon customer support
customer_reviews.text: This product bricked after 3 months of light use. Trigger stuck on, finally unstuck, then tied in the charge base to where it had no life signs. Dyson has ZERO customer support other than a lame web site that had nothing related to my issue and no way to speak to a human being after multiple attempts by both myself and Amazon Customer Support. I understand COVID issues, but this is six months in and excuses are wearing thin. We loved the V11 Animal while it worked. Lack of customer support for this expensive an item is pathetic.
customer_reviews.author: Valsuka

customer_reviews.title: Great suction
customer_reviews.text: Easy, lightweight, great suction. Cordless means freedom and ultimately getting more done more efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D.

customer_reviews.title: The best Dyson so far
customer_reviews.text: Amazing suction power, great battery life and fast charging. It's a bit heavy to hold and the maneuverability could be smoother, but overall this is a great product
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I deleted one star only because this really is a heavy cordless vacuum. It requires two hands for me to lift it off its wall docking station. On the other hand, even though it is heavier than my old Dyson, it is also much more powerful so it takes less time to finish the job. Now, if Dyson could just invent a way to make me actually LIKE doing housework, I'd be all set!
customer_reviews.author: Just another opinion

customer_reviews.title: Just don't do it....
customer_reviews.text: Literally started using this unit Jan. 1st of 2020. A month later it developed an issue where it wouldn't turn off, 2 weeks later the motorhead on the carpet cleaner quit (even when completely cleaned). Contacted Dyson. Just received replacement main unit....its almost the end of June, but the motorhead still won't work. I won't buy another overpriced, unreliable Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: D B

customer_reviews.title: Great suction power by far over other cordless vacuums
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I had was as soon as I took it out of the box, it automatically turned on by itself. There is a disconnect with the trigger button because I had to tap the bottom of the battery to turn it off. I had to send it back to Dyson to get a replacement. Otherwise it is definitely by far the best cordless vacuum out there! I even tested it against another cordless vacuum which didn’t compare to the suction and runtime to the Dyson torque V11!
customer_reviews.author: Jinetta L. Hemraj

customer_reviews.title: The best vacuum cleaner made, and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I had a Dyson Animal vacuum cleaner and I got over a decade of great use from it, but this model is so much easier to use now that I have gotten older and I am disabled. I can clean my own floors again and I feel like I'm a young man again. And, just like the first one I had, it is beyond all other vacuum cleaners by miles. I could not be happier with a vacuum cleaner, and I could never have a better one than a Dyson. As always, I recommend this Dyson vacuum to anyone who wants the best vacuum cleaner made. I stand by it.
customer_reviews.author: david jennings hansen

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived with someone else’s hair and dirt in it.
customer_reviews.text: This item was used and arrived with hair and debris in the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Flo

customer_reviews.title: Missing extra tool bundle
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum. Got it a a great price. Never got extra tool bundle. Seller replied item were in back order and will ship when available. 6 weeks later no extra tool bundle.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love, but having trouble
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum, however, after only 2 months the battery doesn’t charge. I’ll post a vid. I ordered a new charger, spent 45$ and waited a week and a half for shipping and it’s still not working. Soooo frustrated. I love everything about this so I’m going crazy not being able to use it as often as I do, which is almost every day! It showed an error message like “filter clogged” so I followed the directions in the manual and washed it out and let it dry for almost 2 days. But now it won’t even charge. Please help! My carpets are dying!!
customer_reviews.author: Care35

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Dyson
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Dyson cordless and at first I was reluctant to purchase the new model. I am so glad we did! This model is larger, more powerful and easily transitions from hard floors to carpet. It is far superior to our previous model.
customer_reviews.author: Yoop

customer_reviews.title: Convenient cordless, however expect it to break after the two year warranty is up
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Dyson stick vac. The cordless feature is nice, this one is kind of heavy. The vacuum head is longer from top bottom so harder to slide in sideways to narrow areas. Mine have both failed right when the warranty expired so only expect to get two years out of it. And conveniently they have a nice improved version to compel one to upgrade rather than hassle with repair or battery replacement. Kind of a rip off considering the luxury price.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Died after 1 day of use. Defective trigger.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first day. On the second day when I pulled the trigger it wouldn’t turn off until the battery died. I guess this is a common problem with the V11, and although Dyson is doing a warranty exchange I still haven’t received my replacement, and odds are they’ll send a refurbished model to replace my 1 day old new purchase. Very disappointed that I spent so much on a vacuum to have it immediately not work, and then having to wait weeks for the replacement. Probably will be the last Dyson I purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Digital Donkey

customer_reviews.title: The best for picking up Cat hair
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Dyson vacuum cleaner. I've purchased other Dyson vacuums, this one is the best for picking up very fine cat hair (two cats to blame). Very easy and light to control, not as noisy as some others on the market. Love that it tells how much charge is left and particularly love the auto light so I am able to vacuum different flooring without a change of utility fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke less than a year
customer_reviews.text: The trigger on the handle broke less than a year. We did all that we could to make sure it wasn't just a clog or the filter needed to be replaced. Nothing worked and I cleaned the vacuum thoroughly. I contacted Dyson customer service and they basically told me I was SOL with regards to it being covered under warranty because I bought it from a seller on Amazon that is NOT an authorized retailer. Learned my lesson but I am also disappointed that Dyson could not at least give me a discount for a new vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Ira

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I agonized over deciding to buy this because the price did seem high. But I am glad I got it. It is light weight, cordless, easy to use, has great suction power, and is versitile enough for all my vacuuming needs. I had a different brand cordless vac before and it was a pain to change out the accessories. With the dyson it is very quick and easy to change them. Also it comes with something that can be attached to the vacuum that holds two of the accessories. It is also pretty easy to empty and clean.
customer_reviews.author: OMEvans

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of the best investments I’ve ever made. I have 3 dogs and this does an incredible job of picking up most of the hair and mess from them. Would 100% recommend
customer_reviews.author: BCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Strength = Animal + Suction + Popeye Forearms
customer_reviews.text: This cumbersome, heavy piece will suck the life out of the surfaces you put it on! I will never go back to a corded vacuum again. WARNING: YOU NEED STRENGTH TO WIELD THIS ANIMAL. Not sure if it's worth it, as I am now missing an arm and a leg... all jokes aside.. its awesome. buy it. you'll get Popeye forearms.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Cheng

customer_reviews.title: New new love!
customer_reviews.text: The suction is amazing on boost! I have a small 900 sf place so it still has battery life when I am done! It worked great on the stairs for my initial run but I haven't tried it as the smaller handheld option yet. The wall mount is so nice however, I am baffled as to how all of the parts can be held between the wall mount and the additional holder attachment that goes on the stick. Maybe I am just having a 'blonde moment'? I reduced the rating due to the lack of holders for the additional parts. I don't like needing to store a piece somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: LMac

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my cat castle under control!
customer_reviews.text: Zero regrets with this vacuum. I had previously used the Animal v8, which was wonderful, but when I found myself on my own and in the need of a vacuum again, I decided to upgrade to the most recent version. It was completely worth it and I appreciate the stronger suction and longer battery life. If you’re looking for a great vacuum but have a lower budget, you won’t be disappointed by the v8; however, if you’re in a place to invest a little bit more for a better result, the v11 won’t disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Its great buuuuut!
customer_reviews.text: After I was finally able to get the main head to work, it's been great. I had to contact Dyson about the main head not working, they told me to ship the whole vacuum back to them, which isn't an option for me ( I cant go without a vacuum).
customer_reviews.author: Bradley P.

customer_reviews.title: BEST VACUUM EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute best vacuum ever. We replaced a shark vacuum with this baby and have been soooo pleased. The amount that our shark missed and this thing got up has been disgusting. We’ve been using it every day for 2 months now and no problems at all. It’s so much more convenient to use than a regular upright, which leads to actually using it way more. With three kids 5 and under this thing has really made my life so much easier. Buy it now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Davis

customer_reviews.title: Most powerful stick vacuum I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful stick vacuum. Eco mode is great, can run for up to 66 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Zappy

customer_reviews.title: Desperately Needed for a Shedding Akita
customer_reviews.text: I have a Ruggable that always seems to gather dog hair and other droppings on the bottom layer of the rug. I’m loving this vacuum because it has so much suction that I only have to go through it once. It does not do well with thin rugs as it pulls up because of too much suction, even on the lowest mode. Worked good for the dust on my fan blades too. The set-up was so easy. A little pricey for me but was able to make Amazon installments. I really needed this vacuum because my Akita is not going anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: LauraV

customer_reviews.title: Dirty and Smelly
customer_reviews.text: This product has previously been heavily used.m even though I bought new. The canister was dirty, scratched, and dented. When you turned it on, your entire room smelled of cigarettes. I returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: megga megg

customer_reviews.title: Much longer run time than Animal V8
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is a major improvement from the Animal V8 as far as run time. Both are great products, but if you have a larger area to vacuum then the V11 is a worthwhile upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally got a shark cordless vacuum and wasn’t a fan of it so I suckered in and got this. I was afraid the push to hold power button would irritate me and wouldn’t be convenient but actually isn’t bad especially for the job the vac does. I can easily vacuum the house two times and it still manages to pick stuff up. I also love it cause I can easily just vacuum something up. One downfall is the battery isn’t removable so if it dies, it dies and you have to wait.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Opened Dyson Box
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Dyson V11 today. When I opened the amazon box and pulled out the Dyson box it was completely opened on one end and everything fell out. I paid over $600 for this sweeper the least you could do is ship it in a good box.
customer_reviews.author: matthew maggard

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!! waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 of these V11 vacuums in the past 6 months and I had to return both for a refund. Both vacuums would power on and off by itself after only weeks of use making it almost impossible to use. Both vacuums would continuously get clogged with very minimal use. I would have to take apart the entire vacuum every 5 minutes just to pull out the dog hair from the inner tube of the vacuum. TERRIBLE DESIGN.. If you are looking to purchase a cordless Dyson purchase the V8 animal instead. I have had much better luck with those as I own 3 of them and they have never given me any problems.
customer_reviews.author: William F

customer_reviews.title: Trigger
customer_reviews.text: I have had this two months, bought Jan. 6. The "trigger" used to squeeze to run the vacuum is defective. Squeezing the trigger, some times it works and some times it does not. My fault for not submitting the registration. Shame on me. However when the vacuum works, it works good...
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Amazon and Dyson backed up my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Power Trigger switch was was not working properly. Would not turn off. I was disappointed that my long awaited Dyson V11 Animal stick cordless vacuum was not working properly. I called the "call me" selection on the orders section of my amazon smile page. Amazon called me back within 15 seconds. Then they connected me to Dyson (Amazon stayed on the line to make sure everything was handled) and Dyson resolved the issue. First class service from both Amazon and Dyson
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked 3 times! Not worth $500
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this vacum was cordless, light, & recommended for especially for dog hair. The auction was powerful "THE THREE TIMES IT WORKED"!! I am very disappointed, BUT so thankful I purchased the 3 year warranty! I just pray that the warranty will replace this over priced vacum!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: northa w sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Dyson won’t honor warranty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum one year ago. It completely stopped working a few weeks ago. After going back and forth with Dyson I am told that Dyson on Amazon is an unauthorized dealer so my warranty is invalid. Even though the product on Amazon , today, clearly states there is a warranty with this product. I have a $500 vacuum that doesn’t work and no one at Dyson will help.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Willis

customer_reviews.title: Powered head is a game changer for carpet
customer_reviews.text: We had a previous Dyson that didn’t have a powered head. While it was great for hardwood and tile, it was more or less useless for carpet. Having a powered head in this model is a real game changer. You can legitimately use it as your only vacuum 95% of the time, especially if you live in a smaller home or apartment. The vacuum is reasonably quiet and powerful. The automatic speed adjustment works great and only takes a second or two to kick in.
customer_reviews.author: Chillin

customer_reviews.title: Best cordless vacuum cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs, including a German Shepherd that sheds heavily. This vacuum did not disappoint. It has powerful suction and it’s easy to carry around. I have to empty the canister frequently, but it sucks up hair like no other vacuum I have used. Well worth the money. I saved Amazon points for this one and waited for a sale! Best vacuum purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: Vanna

customer_reviews.title: Dyson come true! BEST VACUUM!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve waited 10 years to buy a dyson and my wife surprised me recently and bought me one for my birthday. Honestly, I will never buy another vacuum again. My wife vacuumed the same day I got the V11 and the V11 still picked up dust left behind. It’s fairly light, not much heavier than a 20V drill. It’s super easy on hardwood floor and tile. Depending on your carpet height, it may require some extra strength pushing through but I think it’s more to do with the suction power than anything else. I know the price is higher than most other cordless vacuums on the market. IT IS WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the best vacuum ever
customer_reviews.text: this vacuum will make your life much more easier. it sucks all the dirt off the floor and carpet. what i love about it is that it is cordless and can be moved easily from room to room. this vacuum has 3 modes: boost, medium and auto and changes modes automatically when you go from hard wood floor to carpet. MAGIC. what I love as well is that even if you do not see any dirt on you carpet, this guy will even get the dust. It comes with 6 attachements, each one for a different kind of cleaning (corners, ceilings, car, chairs... ). just buy thsi vacuum and you'll see that it is worth the high price.
customer_reviews.author: meriem

customer_reviews.title: Heavy when vacuuming stairs and have to hold on to button
customer_reviews.text: Good suction power. Nice battery indicator. However it is quite heavy especially when lifting it up to vacuum stairs. Also agree with other reviewers that it’s not convenient to have to hold the button down to keep machine running the whole time. Almost prefer a sliding button for on/off instead.
customer_reviews.author: CT_NJ

customer_reviews.title: Suction & ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: It actually makes house cleaning easy, & with no cord to contend with it's a wonderful feature.. We use it on carpets, tile & hardwood floors, and it does a fantastic job. Our house is one story & fairly large. We can do the areas that we use the most often in about 30 minutes. It's easy to empty the container -- hang the unit up and we are through -- could not be easier!!
customer_reviews.author: Stockmom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t suck at sucking up messes
customer_reviews.text: I love this darn thing. It seemed pricey, but you get what you pay for with Dyson. And this one hasn’t disappointed us! It converts well, which we really need as we have a lot of stairs. I can swap attachments super quick and easy. It also has worked really well with the smaller roller attachment to quickly clean twigs and leaves on our outdoor furniture! The battery life is excellent. It’s so easy to dump out. The filter is very accessible. Even my vaccuum-averse spouse has taken it up to do some spot cleaning. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: gmonet

customer_reviews.title: Husband even loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband of 39 years hates vacuum cleaners. He complains that they are cumbersome, loud, and generally a pain. Imagine how surprised I was when I came home and found him using the new Dyson! He loves tools, and he has high praise for the engineering efficiency. I was thrilled and told him how sexy he looked vacuuming. Romance in the living room! Thanks Dyson!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa A. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever Vacuum I’ve Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a vacuum like this all my life. I’ve bought 3 expensive Rainbows throughout the years for their suction power but their weight prevented me from vacuuming often. Add to that the disposal of the dirty water. So I also bought inexpensive stick vacuums to do in-between vacuuming . These were light and easy but not powerful. And the chords also hampered the vacuuming process. The Dyson V11 has both the power and maneuverability. As a bonus, it’s also a hand held vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca GS

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Dyson v11 Animal from Amazon. Now 7 months later it has quit working. I contacted Dyson and they offered to replace my item and asked for the serial number off the back. Unfortunately, the numbers and letters are all in Chinese so the Dyson warranty is not valid. If I would have known this, I would not have ordered this from Amazon. I would have ordered from the Dyson website.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Gullette

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for... Is there any more to say? Well maybe... This is not my first Dyson cordless. I bought a Dyson cordless four years ago and found it was amazing even back then. There are plenty of knock-offs out there now but none stack up to a Dyson. No one can produce the quality without the increased price attached. Every company selling anything needs to make a profit...so if you're looking at a competitors product and seeing a massive price difference and think the competitor isn't making money, you're wrong. So what's the difference? The product! You simply get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: jim d

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.  Unreliable product and Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Stopped charging after 6 months, after returning it and get a new one and it broke again in a month. The company refuse to return it. Do NOT buy this machine!!! If I can give zero star I would.
customer_reviews.author: Chaoran

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum on the market. I’m not into the robot vacuums so I got the best hand held battery vacuum I could find and this is it. I can vacuum my 2000 sqft home with more than half charge left. Love the auto switch feature as you go from tile to carpet and back again. Easy to maneuver and easy to clean. I bump it into a lot of stuff and it doesn’t care lol. Dyson makes the best stuff hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Install the base charger in a conveniently accessible location. Need small box for the accessories.
customer_reviews.text: Cordless operation. Hi power levels limit battery time severely. Really need an air compressor to clean the unit properly; just emptying it in the trash does not clear the fine dust out and it accumulates a LOT of it. Compressor will also clean the filter instead of trying to wash it in water. Unit cost is on the high side, but the convenience of not having to run a power cord is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Geis

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Dyson thinks it is.
customer_reviews.text: Suction is good but without a powered roller brush, comes to a stop on plush rugs. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: noxide

customer_reviews.title: Known issues from factory - not resolved
customer_reviews.text: So this vacuum is amazing - when it works. Suction is incredible. Mine worked for a few minutes, then the motor stopped functioning. The display is still "on" and shows charge. After reading on forums, I found there are several "common issues" from the factory that could have caused this. One is a motor malfunction. The other is a trigger malfunction. Unfortunately, the fact that these are known issues & haven't been resolved on such a premium vacuum lead me to returning it. My concern is longevity.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda t

customer_reviews.title: Very Annoying
customer_reviews.text: You have the hold down the trigger in order to vacuum it wont do it on its own. 2nd. Does not have a light so i cant see what I am vacuuming. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

product_meta.title: Dyson V11 Torque Drive Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, Blue
product_meta.description:
Style:Torque Drive

Twice the suction of any cord-free vacuum.andsup1; Cord-free cleaning, made easier. Intelligently optimizes suction and run time, to deep clean everywhere. With fade-free battery power and a battery-saving trigger. And real-time reporting on the LCD screen to give you control of your clean. The Dynamic Load Sensor (DLS) system automatically changes the motor speed between carpets and hard floors. For deep cleaning across floor types. The Dyson V11 Torque Drive cord-free vacuum quickly transforms to a handheld for quick clean ups, spot cleaning and cleaning difficult places.

Features:

 * CONTINUOUSLY SENSES. THEN AUTOMATICALLY ADAPTS POWER. The Dynamic Load Sensor (DLS) system automatically changes the motor speed between carpets and hard floors. For deep cleaning across floor types.
 * INTELLIGENTLY REPORTS IN REAL TIME. LCD screen shows current performance, including selected power mode, remaining run time, filter maintenance reminders and blockage reports.
 * DYSON DIGITAL MOTOR V11 HELPS DELIVER 40% MORE SUCTION POWER THAN THE DYSON V8 CORD-FREE. Motor spins at up to 125, 000rpm to create powerful suction
 * WHOLE-MACHINE FILTRATION CAPTURES 99. 97% OF MICROSCOPIC DUST PARTICLES AS SMALL AS 0. 3 MICRONS. Captures dust and allergens to expel cleaner air.
 * UP TO 60 MINUTES OF FADE-FREE POWER. Lighter, yet more powerful 7-cell lithium-ion batteries. *Actual runtime will vary based on power mode and/or attachments used.
 * 14 CYCLONES. 14 cyclones generate forces of more than 79. 000g to fling microscopic particles into the bin.
 * TRANSFORMS TO A HANDHELD. Quickly and easily transforms to a handheld for cleaning on the stairs, in the car and on the sofa.
 * REACHES UNDER LOW FURNITURE. Low profile cleaner heads and slim design make it easy to clean low and awkward spaces.
 * ACOUSTICALLY ENGINEERED. UNPLEASANT TONES ELIMINATED. Acoustic baffles built into the motor divert direct sound and improve airflow making the V11 Torque Drive quiet to use.
 * MINI-MOTORIZED TOOL. Removes pet hair and dirt from carpet and upholstery.
 * EXTRA TOOLS. For whole home and car cleaning.
 * DOCKING STATION. Convenient docking station stores and charges the machine, and holds additional attachments. So it's always ready to go.
 * IN THE BOX. Torque drive head, mini-motorized tool, crevice tool, stubborn dirt brush, soft dusting brush, combination tool, wand storage clip, docking station, andamp; charger.

andnbsp;

After registering your free 2 year warranty, your Dyson machine will be covered for parts and labor (excluding filters) for 2 years from the date of purchase, subject to the terms of the . If you have any questions about your Dyson machine, call the Dyson Helpline with your serial number and details of where and when you bought the machine. Most questions can be solved over the phone by one of our trained Dyson Helpline staff.

andnbsp;

andsup1;Tested at the cleaner head to ASTM F558, dust-loaded, against cord-free stick market.

andnbsp; andnbsp;
feature_bullets: Dyson's most intelligent, powerful cordless vacuum. Twice the suction of any cordless vacuum.
Dyson technology helps create a cleaner, healthier home - Our vacuums and purifiers are scientifically proven to capture particles as small as allergens and bacteria.
Engineered for whole-home, deep cleaning. Suction power, run time and tools designed to deep clean your whole home.
Intelligently optimizes suction and run time across all floor types. The right balance of power and run time when you need it.
Up to 60 minutes of run time. Engineered for larger homes with pets. Actual run time will vary based on power mode, floor type and/or attachments used.
High torque cleaner head. Automatically adapts suction and power to deep clean different floor types without changing cleaner heads.
Advanced whole-machine filtration. Advanced whole-machine filtration traps 99.99% of particles, dust and allergens as small as 0.3 microns.
5 Dyson engineered tools for versatile whole-home and car cleaning. Including the mini-motorized tool for removing pet hair from upholstery and tight spaces.
Converts to a handheld for cleaning cars, stairs and upholstery
Included: Torque drive head, mini-motorized tool, crevice tool, stubborn dirt brush, soft dusting brush, combination tool, wand storage clip, docking station, & charger

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,121 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: The warranty of this vacuum cleaner is 2 years on all parts and labor.
specifications.Included Components: Combination tool, crevice tool, mini motorized tool, stiff bristle brush, mini soft dusting brush, wand storage clip
